name: Pretty Girls vs Zombies
description:
The car broken down and two pretty girls stuck in the Junkyard full of Zombies.

Pretty Girls vs Zombies is a simple but addictive games.

The car broken down and two pretty girls stuck in the Junkyard full of Zombies. You need to help them to survive.

HOW TO PLAY PRETTY GIRLS VS ZOMBIES:

* Build up your war castle
* Shoot down all zombies
* And team work to help each other

WHAT PRETTY GIRLS vs ZOMBIES OFFERS:

* 20 amazing game levels
* 2 different kinds of castle
* 8 types of guns

Do note that there are many kind of zombies! And you can choose the right GUNs for each level.

DOWNLOAD PRETTY GIRLS VS ZOMBIES NOW!
